attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would very much like to see a more Switzerland type referendum policy when it comes to any new "initiative" (Laws) which relate directly to the social/private lives of British citizens.  Lately this would have included Net Piracy/24 Hour drinking etc.  All of which are far better to be left in the publics hands rather than business paid lobby groups.  I would prefer a different answer than "this has not been done in the past" as a response whatever the response is.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. At the moment it reads: Social referendums.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
